TEXT.English: Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.French: Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.German: Hüter der Nôggormotha
TEXT.Italian: Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.Spanish: Keeper of Nôggormotha

TEXT.English: Fallen Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.French: Fallen Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.German: Gefallener Hüter der Nôggormotha
TEXT.Italian: Fallen Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.Spanish: Fallen Keeper of Nôggormotha

TEXT.English: Blessed Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.French: Blessed Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.German: Gesegneter Hüter der Nôggormotha
TEXT.Italian: Blessed Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.Spanish: Blessed Keeper of Nôggormotha

TEXT.English: It had been Ersorn, the abbot of the Order, who had the idea. He had been thought to be wise and so the others had followed his plan to bind Nôggormotha by trapping her insider their bodies. It was his luck that he died during the capture. Oh, Ersorn wasn't the one who had to stand the tempting whispers of the demon of torture after it had been done. He was not the one who wanted to kill his brothers during the nights, listening to the honey sweet voice inside oh them. And he was not the one who gave the advice to leave the monastery and to get as much space and time between themselves as possible. Just to keep the demon quiet and to keep the beloved brothers alive. They were. The keepers of Nôggormotha, damned to live a lonely life, parted from their friends and brothers and always living in fear to face them on the battlefield some day. What a fool Ersorn had been!
TEXT.French: It had been Ersorn, the abbot of the Order, who had the idea. He had been thought to be wise and so the others had followed his plan to bind Nôggormotha by trapping her insider their bodies. It was his luck that he died during the capture. Oh, Ersorn wasn't the one who had to stand the tempting whispers of the demon of torture after it had been done. He was not the one who wanted to kill his brothers during the nights, listening to the honey sweet voice inside oh them. And he was not the one who gave the advice to leave the monastery and to get as much space and time between themselves as possible. Just to keep the demon quiet and to keep the beloved brothers alive. They were. The keepers of Nôggormotha, damned to live a lonely life, parted from their friends and brothers and always living in fear to face them on the battlefield some day. What a fool Ersorn had been!
TEXT.German: Es war Ersorn gewesen, der Abt des Ordens, der die Idee gehabt hatte. Er war als weise angesehen worden und so folgten die anderen seinem Plan, Nôggormotha zu binden, indem man sie in den eigenen Körpern einsperrte. Es war sein Glück, dass er während der Gefangennahme gestorben war. Oh, Ersorn war nicht derjenige, der die verführerischen Einflüsterungen der Dämonin der Folter ertragen musste, nachdem es vollbracht war. Er war nicht derjenige, der seine Brüder während der Nächte töten wollte, der honigsüßen Stimme in ihnen lauschend. Und er war nicht der gewesen, der den Rat gab, das Kloster zu verlassen und so viel Raum und Zeit zwischen sich zu bringen, wie möglich. Einfach nur, um die Dämonin zu beruhigen und die geliebten Brüder am Leben zu lassen. Sie waren es gewesen. Die Hüter der Nôggormotha, zu einem einsamen Leben verdammt, getrennt von ihren Freunden und Brüdern und ständig in Angst lebend, ihnen doch eines Tages auf dem Schlachtfeld gegenüber zu stehen. Was für ein Narr Ersorn gewesen war!
TEXT.Italian: It had been Ersorn, the abbot of the Order, who had the idea. He had been thought to be wise and so the others had followed his plan to bind Nôggormotha by trapping her insider their bodies. It was his luck that he died during the capture. Oh, Ersorn wasn't the one who had to stand the tempting whispers of the demon of torture after it had been done. He was not the one who wanted to kill his brothers during the nights, listening to the honey sweet voice inside oh them. And he was not the one who gave the advice to leave the monastery and to get as much space and time between themselves as possible. Just to keep the demon quiet and to keep the beloved brothers alive. They were. The keepers of Nôggormotha, damned to live a lonely life, parted from their friends and brothers and always living in fear to face them on the battlefield some day. What a fool Ersorn had been!
TEXT.Spanish: It had been Ersorn, the abbot of the Order, who had the idea. He had been thought to be wise and so the others had followed his plan to bind Nôggormotha by trapping her insider their bodies. It was his luck that he died during the capture. Oh, Ersorn wasn't the one who had to stand the tempting whispers of the demon of torture after it had been done. He was not the one who wanted to kill his brothers during the nights, listening to the honey sweet voice inside oh them. And he was not the one who gave the advice to leave the monastery and to get as much space and time between themselves as possible. Just to keep the demon quiet and to keep the beloved brothers alive. They were. The keepers of Nôggormotha, damned to live a lonely life, parted from their friends and brothers and always living in fear to face them on the battlefield some day. What a fool Ersorn had been!

TEXT.English: Every time a keeper of Nôggormotha kills one of his brothers, he gains all of the power of the demon that lived within his opponent. When fighting ordinary foes, he is immortal, as the demonic entity forbids the body to die and sends him back to the capital to regain strength and health to continue his endless torture. But beware of more powerful keepers in the hands of your enemies. Do not give them the power of you keeper!
TEXT.French: Every time a keeper of Nôggormotha kills one of his brothers, he gains all of the power of the demon that lived within his opponent. When fighting ordinary foes, he is immortal, as the demonic entity forbids the body to die and sends him back to the capital to regain strength and health to continue his endless torture. But beware of more powerful keepers in the hands of your enemies. Do not give them the power of you keeper!
TEXT.German: Jedes Mal, wenn ein Hüter der Nôggormotha einen seiner Brüder tötet, erhält er all dessen Kraft und dessen Bruchstücke des dämonischen Wesens leben in ihm weiter. Im Kampf gegen gewöhnliche Feinde ist er unsterblich, da der Dämon seinem Körper den Tod vorenthält und und ihn stets in die Hauptstadt zurückschickt, um neue Kräfte und Gesundheit zu erlangen, um seine ewige Folter zu erdulden. Doch sei auf der Hut vor noch mächtigeren Hütern in den Händen Eurer Feinde. Gebt ihnen nicht die Kraft EURES Hüters!
TEXT.Italian: Every time a keeper of Nôggormotha kills one of his brothers, he gains all of the power of the demon that lived within his opponent. When fighting ordinary foes, he is immortal, as the demonic entity forbids the body to die and sends him back to the capital to regain strength and health to continue his endless torture. But beware of more powerful keepers in the hands of your enemies. Do not give them the power of you keeper!
TEXT.Spanish: Every time a keeper of Nôggormotha kills one of his brothers, he gains all of the power of the demon that lived within his opponent. When fighting ordinary foes, he is immortal, as the demonic entity forbids the body to die and sends him back to the capital to regain strength and health to continue his endless torture. But beware of more powerful keepers in the hands of your enemies. Do not give them the power of you keeper!

TEXT.English: Blessed Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.French: Blessed Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.German: Gesegneter Hüter der Nôggormotha
TEXT.Italian: Blessed Keeper of Nôggormotha
TEXT.Spanish: Blessed Keeper of Nôggormotha

TEXT.English: Upgrade to Blessed Keeper
TEXT.French: Upgrade to Blessed Keeper
TEXT.German: Zu Gesegnetem Hüter aufwerten
TEXT.Italian: Upgrade to Blessed Keeper
TEXT.Spanish: Upgrade to Blessed Keeper

TEXT.English: Upgrade to Fallen Keeper
TEXT.French: Upgrade to Fallen Keeper
TEXT.German: Zu Gefallenem Hüter aufwerten
TEXT.Italian: Upgrade to Fallen Keeper
TEXT.Spanish: Upgrade to Fallen Keeper

TEXT.English: Nôggormotha
TEXT.French: Nôggormotha
TEXT.German: Nôggormotha
TEXT.Italian: Nôggormotha
TEXT.Spanish: Nôggormotha

TEXT.English: Noone knows much about the demon of torture. Ask Saronath, maybe he knows.
TEXT.French: Noone knows much about the demon of torture. Ask Saronath, maybe he knows.
TEXT.German: Niemand weiß viel über die Dämonin der Folter. Frag Saronath, vielleicht weiß er etwas.
TEXT.Italian: Noone knows much about the demon of torture. Ask Saronath, maybe he knows.
TEXT.Spanish: Noone knows much about the demon of torture. Ask Saronath, maybe he knows.

TEXT.English: Torture your enemies with Nôggormotha's help!
TEXT.French: Torture your enemies with Nôggormotha's help!
TEXT.German: Quäle deine Feinde mit der Hilfe von Nôggormotha!
TEXT.Italian: Torture your enemies with Nôggormotha's help!
TEXT.Spanish: Torture your enemies with Nôggormotha's help!

TEXT.English: After the death of the last of his brothers of his order the only left keeper of Nôggormotha was standing still and took a deep breath. The blissful grin on his face grew bigger and bigger. He succeeded. Noone would ever be a threat to him now and ever again. He teetered back and forth and silently enjoyed his triumph. Inspired by Nôggormotha's powers he knew, a greater fate was his now. He watched the sky grew darker. How the storm came out of nowhere and how the wind died away all out of a sudden. No sound was to be heard. He became unsteady. Adrenaline ran through his veins. What the hell . was happening? His stomach ached. He was really sick. His forehead burned like all fires of hell together. He tumbled and collapsed. Crawling on the ground and looking for safe grip he vomited and passed out. When he regained consciousness, he heard a giggle, that grew into a high and scornful laugh. He looked up and looked into the grimace-like face of a tall women. Except for her evil eyes and her disfigered mouth she was very beautiful. Clad in red gold and sourrounded by a creepy wreath of swords, there was no other way for the spectator to admit that she was as dangerous as she was impressive. She looked at him, amused. Her ridiculing tone of voice was not to be overheard.: 'Thank you so much. Are you alright? Have you got used to me so much that the longing for sickened you right the moment I left your body? But yes, I admit, I would cry, too. You have no idea how to use my powers! How you will be screaming as soon as you realize, how perfect I am at giving pain and doom to hose who dare to stand in my way. Do you want to know?' She smiled at him and with having said what she wanted, Nôggormotha, the Mistress of Torture, turned around and was gone.
TEXT.French: After the death of the last of his brothers of his order the only left keeper of Nôggormotha was standing still and took a deep breath. The blissful grin on his face grew bigger and bigger. He succeeded. Noone would ever be a threat to him now and ever again. He teetered back and forth and silently enjoyed his triumph. Inspired by Nôggormotha's powers he knew, a greater fate was his now. He watched the sky grew darker. How the storm came out of nowhere and how the wind died away all out of a sudden. No sound was to be heard. He became unsteady. Adrenaline ran through his veins. What the hell . was happening? His stomach ached. He was really sick. His forehead burned like all fires of hell together. He tumbled and collapsed. Crawling on the ground and looking for safe grip he vomited and passed out. When he regained consciousness, he heard a giggle, that grew into a high and scornful laugh. He looked up and looked into the grimace-like face of a tall women. Except for her evil eyes and her disfigered mouth she was very beautiful. Clad in red gold and sourrounded by a creepy wreath of swords, there was no other way for the spectator to admit that she was as dangerous as she was impressive. She looked at him, amused. Her ridiculing tone of voice was not to be overheard.: 'Thank you so much. Are you alright? Have you got used to me so much that the longing for sickened you right the moment I left your body? But yes, I admit, I would cry, too. You have no idea how to use my powers! How you will be screaming as soon as you realize, how perfect I am at giving pain and doom to hose who dare to stand in my way. Do you want to know?' She smiled at him and with having said what she wanted, Nôggormotha, the Mistress of Torture, turned around and was gone.
TEXT.German: Nach der Vernichtung des letzten Bruders aus seinem Orden stand der einzig verbliebene Hüter der Nôggormotha da und atmete tief durch. Das selige Grinsen auf seinem Gesicht wurde breiter und breiter. Er hatte es geschafft. Niemand würde ihm jetzt noch gefährlich werden können. Er wippte leicht hin und her und genoss seinen Triumph. Beseelt von den Kräften Nôggormothas war ihm ein größeres Schicksal zugedacht. Er beobachtete, wie sich der Himmel verdunkelte, wie es zu stürmen begann und wie sich der Wind mit einem Mal legte. Kein einziger Laut war zu hören. Er wurde unruhig. Adrenalin schoss durch seinen Körper. Was passierte hier? Sein Bauch schmerzte. Ihm war furchtbar übel. Seine Stirn glühte. Er schwankte und sank in sich zusammen. Am Boden liegend erbrach er sich. Er wurde ohnmächtig. Als er wieder zu sich kam, hörte er ein Kichern, das zu einem hohen und höhnischen Lachen anschwoll. Er blickte auf und erblickte in ein fratzenartiges Gesicht einer hochgewachsenen Frau, abgesehen von ihrem boshaften Augen und dem entstellten Mund war sie wunderschön. In rotes Gold gekleidet und von einem unheimlichen Schwerterkranz umgeben, blieb dem Betrachter keine Wahl, als anzuerkennen, dass sie sowohl gefährlich als auch beeindruckend war. Sie blickte amüsiert auf ihn hinab. Ihre Stimme hatte einen nicht zu überhörenden spöttischen Tonfall: "Vielen Dank. Geht es Euch gut? Habt Ihr Euch so an mich gewöhnt gehabt, dass Ihr vor Sehnsucht in dem Moment erkranktet, da ich Euren Körper verließ? Doch ich würde auch weinen. Ihr wisst doch gar nichts mit meiner Kraft anzufangen. Was werdet Ihr erst heulen, wenn Ihr erkennt, wie perfekt ich Leid und Verderben denen bringe, die sich mir in den Weg stellen. Wollt Ihr es erfahren?" Sie lächelte ihn an und damit machte Nôggormotha, die Meisterin der Folter, auf dem Absatz kehrt und verschwand aus seinem Blick.

She smiled at him and with having said what she wanted, Nôggormotha, the Mistress of Torture, turned around and was gone.

TEXT.English: Feeds on agony
TEXT.French: Feeds on agony
TEXT.German: Ernährt sich von Qualen und Leid
TEXT.Italian: Feeds on agony
TEXT.Spanish: Feeds on agony

TEXT.English: A messenger of the so called 'Order of Nôggormotha' reports on a heroic battle of the warrior monks against the Mistress of Torture. The demon Nôggormotha was captured. Though it was not possible to kill her, her power was broken. By a trick her entity was transfered into the bodies of the monks in pieces. Never, never must this entity find back together again. The messenger asks to welcome all 'Keepers of Nôggormotha' in peace and to prevent them from fighting each other. The power and spirit of the demon is so tempting, that this is not easy to do by themselves.
TEXT.French: A messenger of the so called 'Order of Nôggormotha' reports on a heroic battle of the warrior monks against the Mistress of Torture. The demon Nôggormotha was captured. Though it was not possible to kill her, her power was broken. By a trick her entity was transfered into the bodies of the monks in pieces. Never, never must this entity find back together again. The messenger asks to welcome all 'Keepers of Nôggormotha' in peace and to prevent them from fighting each other. The power and spirit of the demon is so tempting, that this is not easy to do by themselves.
TEXT.German: Ein Gesandter des sogenannten 'Ordens der Nôggormotha' berichtet von dem heroischen Kampf der Kriegermönche gegen die Meisterin der Folter. Die Dämonin Nôggormotha wurde gefangen genommen. Es gelang zwar nicht, sie zu besiegen, doch ihre Kraft wurde gebrochen, indem durch eine List ihr Wesen in die Körper der Mönche transferiert wurde. Niemals dürfen diese Wesen wieder zu einander finden. Der Bote bittet, alle Hüter der Nôggormotha in Frieden aufzunehmen und davor zu bewahren, gegeneinander zu kämpfen. Der Geist und die Macht der Dämonin sei zu verführerisch, als dass die Mönche sich selbst davor schützen könnten.
TEXT.Italian: A messenger of the so called 'Order of Nôggormotha' reports on a heroic battle of the warrior monks against the Mistress of Torture. The demon Nôggormotha was captured. Though it was not possible to kill her, her power was broken. By a trick her entity was transfered into the bodies of the monks in pieces. Never, never must this entity find back together again. The messenger asks to welcome all 'Keepers of Nôggormotha' in peace and to prevent them from fighting each other. The power and spirit of the demon is so tempting, that this is not easy to do by themselves.
TEXT.Spanish: A messenger of the so called 'Order of Nôggormotha' reports on a heroic battle of the warrior monks against the Mistress of Torture. The demon Nôggormotha was captured. Though it was not possible to kill her, her power was broken. By a trick her entity was transfered into the bodies of the monks in pieces. Never, never must this entity find back together again. The messenger asks to welcome all 'Keepers of Nôggormotha' in peace and to prevent them from fighting each other. The power and spirit of the demon is so tempting, that this is not easy to do by themselves.

TEXT.English: An exhausted traveler tells you about a secluded warrior order up in the mountains. The story goes, that the monastery's inhabitants have been afflicted by the demonic Mistress of Torture, Nôggormotha.
TEXT.French: An exhausted traveler tells you about a secluded warrior order up in the mountains. The story goes, that the monastery's inhabitants have been afflicted by the demonic Mistress of Torture, Nôggormotha.
TEXT.German: Ein erschöpfter Wanderer berichtet Euch von einem einsamen Kriegerorden in den Bergen. Man erzählt, dass die Bewohner des Klosters von der dämonischen Meisterin der Folter, Nôggormotha, heimgesucht wurden.
TEXT.Italian: An exhausted traveler tells you about a secluded warrior order up in the mountains. The story goes, that the monastery's inhabitants have been afflicted by the demonic Mistress of Torture, Nôggormotha.
TEXT.Spanish: An exhausted traveler tells you about a secluded warrior order up in the mountains. The story goes, that the monastery's inhabitants have been afflicted by the demonic Mistress of Torture, Nôggormotha.

TEXT.English: A mysterious warrior monk arrives in your capital and joins your people. He calls himself 'Keeper of Nôggormotha'.
TEXT.French: A mysterious warrior monk arrives in your capital and joins your people. He calls himself 'Keeper of Nôggormotha'.
TEXT.German: Ein geheimnisvoller Kriegermönch, der sich selbst als 'Hüter der Nôggormotha' vorstellt, schließt sich Eurem Volk an.
TEXT.Italian: A mysterious warrior monk arrives in your capital and joins your people. He calls himself 'Keeper of Nôggormotha'.
TEXT.Spanish: A mysterious warrior monk arrives in your capital and joins your people. He calls himself 'Keeper of Nôggormotha'.

TEXT.English: Nôggormotha left the body of the only left keeper and will act on her own now ... with all her might!
TEXT.French: Nôggormotha left the body of the only left keeper and will act on her own now ... with all her might!
TEXT.German: Nôggormotha hat den Körper des letzten Hüters verlassen und wird nun eigenständig handeln können ... mit all ihrer Macht!
TEXT.Italian: Nôggormotha left the body of the only left keeper and will act on her own now ... with all her might!
TEXT.Spanish: Nôggormotha left the body of the only left keeper and will act on her own now ... with all her might!

TEXT.English: One of the keepers of Nôggormotha has become so powerful that Nôggormotha gained enough of it to leave his body and will act on her own now ... with all her might!
TEXT.French: One of the keepers of Nôggormotha has become so powerful that Nôggormotha gained enough of it to leave his body and will act on her own now ... with all her might!
TEXT.German: Einer der Hüter der Nôggormotha ist so mächtig geworden, dass Nôggormotha durch seine Kraft seinen Körper verlassen konnte. Sie kann nun eigenständig handeln ... mit all ihrer Macht!
TEXT.Italian: One of the keepers of Nôggormotha has become so powerful that Nôggormotha gained enough of it to leave his body and will act on her own now ... with all her might!
TEXT.Spanish: One of the keepers of Nôggormotha has become so powerful that Nôggormotha gained enough of it to leave his body and will act on her own now ... with all her might!

TEXT.English: One of the Keepers of Nôggormotha was killed in combat by another possessed member of his order. He won't ever return ... as the demonic entities seem to live on in his slayer ... reunited.
TEXT.French: One of the Keepers of Nôggormotha was killed in combat by another possessed member of his order. He won't ever return ... as the demonic entities seem to live on in his slayer ... reunited.
TEXT.German: Einer der Hüter der Nôggormotha wurde von einem anderen besessenen Mitglied seines Ordens erschlagen. Er wird niemals wiederauferstehen ... die dämonischen Wesen scheinen im Bezwinger weiterzuleben ... wieder vereint.
TEXT.Italian: One of the Keepers of Nôggormotha was killed in combat by another possessed member of his order. He won't ever return ... as the demonic entities seem to live on in his slayer ... reunited.
TEXT.Spanish: One of the Keepers of Nôggormotha was killed in combat by another possessed member of his order. He won't ever return ... as the demonic entities seem to live on in his slayer ... reunited.

TEXT.English: Keeper of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... the demonic entity revived the Keeper.
TEXT.French: Keeper of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... the demonic entity revived the Keeper.
TEXT.German: Hüter der Nôggormotha wurde erschlagen. ... das dämonische Wesen hat den Hüter wiederbelebt.
TEXT.Italian: Keeper of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... the demonic entity revived the Keeper.
TEXT.Spanish: Keeper of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... the demonic entity revived the Keeper.

TEXT.English: One of the Keepers of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... He was reborn but the demonic entity expanted onto his slayer as well.
TEXT.French: One of the Keepers of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... He was reborn but the demonic entity expanted onto his slayer as well.
TEXT.German: Einer der Hüter der Nôggormotha wurde erschlagen ... er wurde wiedergeboren, doch das dämonische Wesen hat sich darüber hinaus auf seinen Bezwinger ausgedehnt.
TEXT.Italian: One of the Keepers of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... He was reborn but the demonic entity expanted onto his slayer as well.
TEXT.Spanish: One of the Keepers of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... He was reborn but the demonic entity expanted onto his slayer as well.

TEXT.English: A homeless Keeper of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... The demonic entity of Nôggormotha left him and took hold of his slayer.
TEXT.French: A homeless Keeper of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... The demonic entity Nôggormotha left him and took hold of his slayer.
TEXT.German: Ein Hüter der Nôggormotha wurde erschlagen ... Das dämonische Wesen von Nôggormotha hat auf seinen Bezwinger übergewechselt.
TEXT.Italian: A homeless Keeper of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... The demonic entity Nôggormotha left him and took hold of his slayer.
TEXT.Spanish: A homeless Keeper of Nôggormotha was killed in combat ... The demonic entity Nôggormotha left him and took hold of his slayer.

TEXT.English: The Keepers of Nôggormotha feel the location of their brothers. Not because of the long time together in the monastery not because of deep friendship, but because of the demonic possession, that always looks for íts missing parts of its being. After all, Nôggormotha wants nothing more than the keepers to meet ... and to kill each other.
TEXT.French: The Keepers of Nôggormotha feel the location of their brothers. Not because of the long time together in the monastery not because of deep friendship, but because of the demonic possession, that always looks for íts missing parts of its being. After all, Nôggormotha wants nothing more than the keepers to meet ... and to kill each other.
TEXT.German: Die Hüter der Nôggormotha fühlen den Aufenthaltsort ihrer Brüder. Nicht aufgrund der langen gemeinsamen Zeit im Kloster oder der tiefen Freundschaft und Verbundenheit unter ihnen, sondern wegen der dämonischen Besessenheit, die stets nach den fehlenden Teilen ihres Wesens Ausschau hält. Schließlich will Nôggormotha nichts mehr, als dass die Hüter sich finden ... und sich dann töten.
TEXT.Italian: The Keepers of Nôggormotha feel the location of their brothers. Not because of the long time together in the monastery not because of deep friendship, but because of the demonic possession, that always looks for íts missing parts of its being. After all, Nôggormotha wants nothing more than the keepers to meet ... and to kill each other.
TEXT.Spanish: The Keepers of Nôggormotha feel the location of their brothers. Not because of the long time together in the monastery not because of deep friendship, but because of the demonic possession, that always looks for íts missing parts of its being. After all, Nôggormotha wants nothing more than the keepers to meet ... and to kill each other.

TEXT.French: Nôggormotha's vision
TEXT.German: Nôggormotha's Weitblick
TEXT.Italian: Nôggormotha's vision
TEXT.Spanish: Nôggormotha's vision

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Localizes all units with the 'Keeper of Nôggormotha' promotion on the world map.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Localizes all units with the 'Keeper of Nôggormotha' promotion on the world map.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Lokalisiert alle Einheiten mit der 'Hüter der Nôggormotha'-Beförderung auf der Karte.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Localizes all units with the 'Keeper of Nôggormotha' promotion on the world map.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Localizes all units with the 'Keeper of Nôggormotha' promotion on the world map.

TEXT.English: A 'Keeper of Nôggormotha' has been located.
TEXT.French: A 'Keeper of Nôggormotha' has been located.
TEXT.German: Ein 'Hüter der Nôggormotha' wurde lokalisiert.
TEXT.Italian: A 'Keeper of Nôggormotha' has been located.
TEXT.Spanish: A 'Keeper of Nôggormotha' has been located.

TEXT.English: Keeper's Shrine of Destiny
TEXT.French: Keeper's Shrine of Destiny
TEXT.German: Schrein des schicksalergebenen Hüters
TEXT.Italian: Keeper's Shrine of Destiny
TEXT.Spanish: Keeper's Shrine of Destiny

TEXT.English: Keeper's Shrine of Hope
TEXT.French: Keeper's Shrine of Hope
TEXT.German: Schrein des Hoffnungsvollen Hüters
TEXT.Italian: Keeper's Shrine of Hope
TEXT.Spanish: Keeper's Shrine of Hope

TEXT.English: Both the Keeper's Shrine of Destiny and the Keeper's Shrine of Hope are buildings that give the keeper a home within his newly found people. Whenever a keeper dies in combat agains a common foe, he will be ressurected here. Additionally these building allow the keepers to teleport back home as well. There is a big difference, though. While the good civilizations can only build the Shrine of Hope, that allows to cast 'Assure the Keeper', the evil and even the neutral civilizations prefer the Shrine of Destiny, that follows the goal to reunite Nôggormotha's scattered pieces by the spell 'Nôggormotha's Wish'.
TEXT.French: Both the Keeper's Shrine of Destiny and the Keeper's Shrine of Hope are buildings that give the keeper a home within his newly found people. Whenever a keeper dies in combat agains a common foe, he will be ressurected here. Additionally these building allow the keepers to teleport back home as well. There is a big difference, though. While the good civilizations can only build the Shrine of Hope, that allows to cast 'Assure the Keeper', the evil and even the neutral civilizations prefer the Shrine of Destiny, that follows the goal to reunite Nôggormotha's scattered pieces by the spell 'Nôggormotha's Wish'.
TEXT.German: Sowohl der Schrein des hoffnungsvollen Hüters als auch der Schrein des schicksalsergebenen Hüters sind Gebäude, die dem Hüter ein Heim in seinem neu gefundenem Volk bieten. Wann immer ein Hüter im Kampf gegen einen gewöhnlichen Gegner stirbt, wird er hier wiederbelebt werden. Außerdem erlauben diese Gebäude einen Teleportzauber zurück nach Hause. Und doch besteht ein gravierender Unterschied. Während die guten Zivilisationen nur den Schrein des hoffnungsvollen Hüters bauen können, der es erlaubt, den 'Bestärke den Hüter'-Zauber zu sprechen, bevorzugen die bösen und neutralen Zivilisationen den Schrein des schicksalsergebenen Hüters, der das Ziel verfolgt, Nôggormothas verstreute Teile durch den Zauber 'Nôggormothas Wunsch' wieder zu vereinen.
TEXT.Italian: Both the Keeper's Shrine of Destiny and the Keeper's Shrine of Hope are buildings that give the keeper a home within his newly found people. Whenever a keeper dies in combat agains a common foe, he will be ressurected here. Additionally these building allow the keepers to teleport back home as well. There is a big difference, though. While the good civilizations can only build the Shrine of Hope, that allows to cast 'Assure the Keeper', the evil and even the neutral civilizations prefer the Shrine of Destiny, that follows the goal to reunite Nôggormotha's scattered pieces by the spell 'Nôggormotha's Wish'.
TEXT.Spanish: Both the Keeper's Shrine of Destiny and the Keeper's Shrine of Hope are buildings that give the keeper a home within his newly found people. Whenever a keeper dies in combat agains a common foe, he will be ressurected here. Additionally these building allow the keepers to teleport back home as well. There is a big difference, though. While the good civilizations can only build the Shrine of Hope, that allows to cast 'Assure the Keeper', the evil and even the neutral civilizations prefer the Shrine of Destiny, that follows the goal to reunite Nôggormotha's scattered pieces by the spell 'Nôggormotha's Wish'.

TEXT.English: Nôggormotha's Wish
TEXT.French: Nôggormotha's Wish
TEXT.German: Nôggormothas Wunsch
TEXT.Italian: Nôggormotha's Wish
TEXT.Spanish: Nôggormotha's Wish

TEXT.English: He was thinking about the meeting. All three of them sat in the middle of the shrine within their host's city of Galvenholme. There were candles, and unpleasant scents of surely poisonous plants in the air. The shrine was closed, as it was common with the Keeper being at home. Arlon, the Sheaim keeper these days had invited them and they had talked about old times back at their monastery. . Things were easier with their new people having agreed on open borders or a defense alliance, just like in his and Turno's case who was the third person in the room. And about the fate of their other old friends. Some of them were gone forever. Missing. Killed. What a shame. They should not have fought Nôggormotha for nothing. One thing was a fact. An unknown traitor of their own order was trying to unite as much of the demon's power on his own person by killing his brothers. However, Arlon never had been the guy who calls people from far away to his place just to have a small chat about dead friends and a glass of old bitter wine. There was more about it. He was sure about this. But Arlon was not looking as if he wanted to talk about it. He had changed a lot since their last meeting. His bloodshot eyes showed no understanding anymore. His skin had turned very pale and was laced with unhealthy looking spots and ulcers. And suddenly, out of nowhere, he opened his mouth and laughed. And the laugh was not friendly. The laugh was a whole conversation: 'You are fools. I am the traitor. I will take your demonic strength. I want to have Nôggormotha's powers. And you had no clue about it at all until now. But don't worry. I will let you leave unharmed. You pets!' And the laugh's message became true. They just had entered a dark ritual.

TEXT.English: Demonic entities are reunited by Nôggormotha's Wish.
TEXT.French: Demonic entities are reunited by Nôggormotha's Wish.
TEXT.German: Demonic entities are reunited by Nôggormotha's Wish.
TEXT.Italian: Demonic entities are reunited by Nôggormotha's Wish.
TEXT.Spanish: Demonic entities are reunited by Nôggormotha's Wish.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Needs more than one keeper unit of the same player or team in a city with the 'Keeper's Shrine of Destiny'. Transfers all demonic entities of Nôggormotha onto the caster
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Needs more than one keeper unit of the same player or team in a city with the 'Keeper's Shrine of Destiny'. Transfers all demonic entities of Nôggormotha onto the caster
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Benötigt mehr als einen Hüter desselben Spielers oder Teams in einer Stadt mit dem 'Schrein des schicksalsergebenen Hüters'. Vereint alle dämonischen Wesen Nôggormothas auf den Zaubernden
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Needs more than one keeper unit of the same player or team in a city with the 'Keeper's Shrine of Destiny'. Transfers all demonic entities of Nôggormotha onto the caster

TEXT.English: Assure the Keeper
TEXT.French: Assure the Keeper
TEXT.German: Bestärke den Hüter
TEXT.Italian: Assure the Keeper
TEXT.Spanish: Assure the Keeper

TEXT.English: Assured Keeper
TEXT.French: Assured Keeper
TEXT.German: Bestärkter Hüter
TEXT.Italian: Assured Keeper
TEXT.Spanish: Assured Keeper

TEXT.English: The Keeper's task is too important. Keep him alive! He must not fall to the enemy! A great feast, a big celebration, whatever it takes. There is need to make the keeper strong and defying the danger of losing control of himself or of getting defeated by the evil. This is what his people does if called. Of course there is money needed to feed them as well.
TEXT.French: The Keeper's task is too important. Keep him alive! He must not fall to the enemy! A great feast, a big celebration, whatever it takes. There is need to make the keeper strong and defying the danger of losing control of himself or of getting defeated by the evil. This is what his people does if called. Of course there is money needed to feed them as well.
TEXT.German: Die Aufgabe des Hüters ist zu wichtig. Halte ihn am Leben! Er darf nicht Euren Feinden in die Hände fallen! Ein großes Fest, eine tolle Feier, was immer es braucht. Es besteht die Notwendigkeit, den Hüter stark und widerstandsfähig zu machen, damit er nicht die Kontrolle über sich verliert oder vom Bösen vernichtet wird. Das ist es, was sein Volk tut, wenn es gerufen wird. Natürlich benätigt man etwas Geld, um sie bei solchen Gelegenheiten alle satt zu machen.
TEXT.Italian: The Keeper's task is too important. Keep him alive! He must not fall to the enemy! A great feast, a big celebration, whatever it takes. There is need to make the keeper strong and defying the danger of losing control of himself or of getting defeated by the evil. This is what his people does if called. Of course there is money needed to feed them as well.

There is need to make the keeper strong and defying the danger of losing control of himself or of getting defeated by the evil. This is what his people does if called. Of course there is money needed to feed them as well.

TEXT.English: Teleport Keeper
TEXT.French: Teleport Keeper
TEXT.German: Teleport Keeper
TEXT.Italian: Teleport Keeper
TEXT.Spanish: Teleport Keeper

TEXT.English: Many of the keeper's people believe in his task and can call him back by prayer to his shrine in times of need or danger
TEXT.French: Many of the keeper's people believe in his task and can call him back by prayer to his shrine in times of need or danger
TEXT.German: Viele aus dem Volk des Hüters glauben an seine Sache und können ihn durch ihre Gebete in Zeiten der Gefahr oder Notwendigkeit zu seinem Schrein rufen
TEXT.Italian: Many of the keeper's people believe in his task and can call him back by prayer to his shrine in times of need or danger
TEXT.Spanish: Many of the keeper's people believe in his task and can call him back by prayer to his shrine in times of need or danger

TEXT.English: This unit is a Keeper of Noggormotha.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Keeper is possessed by [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d1[COLOR_REVERT] demonic entities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kill other Keepers to consume their strength.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Eternal Torment[COLOR_REVERT].[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only be killed by other Keepers.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Keeper will be revived in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s2[COLOR_REVERT] if defeated by a non-Keeper unit and has a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d3%[COLOR_REVERT] chance to spread Noggormotha's influence.

TEXT.English: This unit is a Keeper of Noggormotha.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Keeper is possessed by [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d1[COLOR_REVERT] demonic entities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kill other Keepers to consume their strength.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Eternal Torment[COLOR_REVERT].[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only be killed by other Keepers.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Keeper will be revived in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s2[COLOR_REVERT] if defeated by a non-Keeper unit and has a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d3%[COLOR_REVERT] chance to spread Noggormotha's influence.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]This unit is not an original Keeper and has a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]50%[COLOR_REVERT] chance to lose a fraction of its powers after death.

TEXT.Spanish: This unit is a Keeper of Noggormotha.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Keeper is possessed by [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d1[COLOR_REVERT] demonic entities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kill other Keepers to consume their strength.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Eternal Torment[COLOR_REVERT].[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only be killed by other Keepers.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Keeper will be revived in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s2[COLOR_REVERT] if defeated by a non-Keeper unit and has a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d3%[COLOR_REVERT] chance to spread Noggormotha's influence.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]This unit is not an original Keeper and has a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]50%[COLOR_REVERT] chance to lose a fraction of its powers after death.

TEXT.English: This unit is a Keeper of Noggormotha.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Keeper is possessed by [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%d1[COLOR_REVERT] demonic entities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kill other Keepers to consume their strength.[NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Eternal Torment[COLOR_REVERT].[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only be killed by other Keepers.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_RED]Keeper will not be revived without a home![COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: %d1 more to go.
